name: St. Jordi [Archive 2014-04-23]
description:
Cute small Valentine's day gift game I made for Laura (my girlfriend at the time), referencing a real-life game we would play where I would say all the good qualities of her I could come up with in a row. 

The game is basically a unity 2d example project that I slightly modified.

[Game Price set at 99,99€ so nobody buys it, I'm just archiving this for myself]
